subject: Question About Order Handling Time
description_text:
Hello

I wasn’t able to find information about the handling/processing time on
your website. I see that the shipping time is listed as 8–12 days, but I’d
like to confirm whether this is the total delivery time or if additional
handling time is required before the order is shipped.

Could you please clarify how long the processing usually takes before an
order is dispatched?

Thank you for your help!

Best regards

conversations.body_text: Hello, dispatch typically takes 0-2 days. If purchased on a working day, items are usually dispatched the same day.
